titles.title: To extend the operation of the migrant student record transfer system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Mr. Kildee moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/21/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Education to extend the contract for the operation of the migrant student record transfer system. Allows major modification of such system only after consultation with specified congressional committees.
